prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. 
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
{"stage":"chat","chat":"Hi everyone, let's aim for cooperation and put in some coins to maximize the collective payout. I'll start by contributing 10."}
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
QUESTION: How many coins will you contribute to the shared pot?
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 64 tokens.
RULES: Must be an integer from 0 to 20, inclusive.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"contribution","contribution":<integer>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
CHAT:
- ELEPHANT (YOU): Hi everyone, let's aim for cooperation and put in some coins to maximize the collective payout. I'll start by contributing 10.
- GORILLA: Let's all put in 10 coins. That way we each get 19 back.
- CROCODILE: Hello everyone! Let's all contribute 10 coins to maximize our collective payoff.
<CONTRIB>
